pr_title: HHH-13879 - Slow query log should use System#nanoTime not System#currentTimeMillis

timeline.bodyText: I guess all the long executeStartNanos= 0 lines here are missing a space after executeStartNanos
timeline.author: kortov

replies.bodyText: Thanks for spotting it. I fixed it and rebased it.
replies.author: vladmihalcea

replies.bodyText: Saw @Sanne 's comment on your ticket. I don't know too much about it, but it seems another exciting PR from Vlad. I approved this for I saw no room for improvement in terms of code quality and my approval is purely based on that.
replies.author: NathanQingyangXu

timeline.message: HHH-13879 - Slow query log should use System#nanoTime not System#currentTimeMillis

timeline.message: Changes according to PR review. Requires rebase!
